sewing ears make 2 the ears are worked in continuous rnds with black make magic_ring round 1 work 6 sts into ring pull ring tight round 2 2sc into next st single_crochet 2 twice 8 sts round 3 2sc into next st single_crochet 3 twice 10 sts round 4 2sc into next st single_crochet 4 twice 12sts round 5 2sc into next st single_crochet 5 twice 14 sts round 6 single_crochet around round 7 2sc into next st single_crochet 6 twice 16 sts rnds 8-10 single_crochet around round 11 decrease single_crochet in next 6 twice 14 sts rnds 12-21 single_crochet around fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing eyes make 2 with white make magic_ring round 1 work 6 single_crochet into ring join round 2 work 2sc into each st around join 12 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing pupils make 2 with black make magic_ring round 1 work 6 single_crochet into ring join fasten_off leaving a tail for sewing legs make 4 legs are worked in continuous rnds with black make magic_ring disclaimer the character of shaun the sheep is not owned by me but this pattern is © abigail gonzalez chanteuse crochet all rights reserved this pattern may not be sold or otherwise distributed or altered 5 round 1 work 6 single_crochet in magic_ring pull ring tight round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 sts round 3 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 18 sts round 4 *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 24 sts rnds 5-8 single_crochet around round 9 *decrease single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet repeat from * around 18 sts round 10 *decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 12 sts begin stuffing lightly rnds 11-41 single_crochet around fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing tail with white make magic_ring round 1 chain 2 does not count as st work 12 double_crochet into ring join pull ring tight 12 sts round 2 chain 1 *bbl 2sc in next repeat from * around join 18 sts round 3 chain 1 *2sc in next single_crochet 2 repeat from * around join 24 sts round 4 chain 1 *single_crochet bbl 2sc in next bbl repeat from * around join 30 sts round 5 chain 1 single_crochet around join round 6 chain 1 *bbl single_crochet 2 repeat from * around join round 7 chain 1 single_crochet around join round 8 chain 1 *single_crochet 2 bbl repeat from * around join round 9 chain 1 single_crochet around
